name: "Tourbillon Device"
description: The core component of the Experimental Field Generator.  A precision-machined mechanical component that counteracts the effects ofgravity via high-speed rotation. The revolution speed is so fast that it isalmost impossible to capture with the naked eye.  Throughout its long history, the Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic EnergyEngineering has always warred against a flood that once washed countless livesaway, and may yet cover the earth and sky one day far in the future, searchingfor a means to survive.  Arkhium, with its immense energetic potential and power to shatter theshackles of the earth, was once considered the key to the gate of salvation.
